ClassDesc: Used for receiving NMEA sentences from the GNSS. NMEA 0183 is a standard for communicating with marine electronic devices and is a common method for receiving data from a GNSS, typically over a serial port. See @B_android#location#LocationManager#addNmeaListener_E@ to receive NMEA data from the GNSS engine.
